title: Annotation guidelines can be lost
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
1. Put guidelines when network is stable
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/159104094-05033267-8efb-4c93-9366-d32178fe2c2d.png)
2. Turn off the network (simulate network issues)
3. Put guidelines when network is unstable
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/159104125-21757255-12f0-4717-babd-d1529d7f6ca2.png)

Expected result: guidelines saving progress showed and when it times out it showed as failed.
Actual result: Since no saving progress is shown a user can navigate to another page or close the tab and lost his changes.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4522842/159104168-0c9c5189-8683-4bd4-9b2a-4c7ff4adc18e.png)


Your Environment
---------
*   Operating System: Linux
*   Python Version Used: doccano docker
*   When you install doccano: half a year ago. Tested the same on the latest version.
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): doccano docker.
